name: TUOBulbControl
0:
”Alexa turn light on”
”Alexa change room mode to calm”
”Alexa change light brightness to twenty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill provides the ability to turn TUO Circadian Smart Bulbs on and off, update brightness, update bulb color temperature and change Circadian modes. 
To use this skill a user will need an Amazon account and a TUO Circadian Smart Bulb account using the same email address.
This skill is only valid for TUO Circadian Smart Bulbs provisioned through the TUO Life Android and iOS apps.
Turning bulbs on and off as well as changing brightness for both rooms and bulbs is supported. Changing color temperature and Circadian mode for rooms is also supported. 
When selecting to turn a bulb on, the bulb will turn on running the room's currently scheduled Circadian mode. When changing brightness a range of 5 - 100% is supported. Brightness under 5% will turn bulbs off and brightness over 100% will default to 100. Alexa supports a broader range of color temperatures than TUO so when changing color temperature, the TUO system will select the closest temperature available for the current mode. We support changing rooms to Wake, Super Wake (a more intensive version of Wake), Active and Calm modes.
